1506400.name: Women's Quiz
1506400.description:
Women’s Quiz is a video game with questions about the life and work of famous women. You will find more than 200 questions about 50 relevant women in history such as Marie Curie, Amelia Earhart or Virginia Woolf.

Women’s Quiz is a video game that aims to make the life and work of the most relevant women in history visible via questions. If you want to get to know them, this game is for you!

5 Categories

You will find questions about women in history, science, cinema, sports, art and literature.
It has five categories that you can choose from, making it perfect for all ages! From cartoons and video games to sports and history - we've got you covered.

6 Levels Of Difficulty

As you answer the questions correctly, the different levels of difficulty will be unlocked. Get to unlock all six and become an expert on the life and work of women.

Single Player Vs Multiplayer

Women's Quiz is a videogame that can be played alone or in the company of your family/ colleagues.

More Than 50 famous Women

An entertaining video game with questions from relevant women:
Marie Curie, Rosa Parks, Emmeline Pankhurst, Ada Lovelace, Rosalind Franklin, Margaret Thatcher, Angela Burdett-Coutts, Mary Wollstonecraft, Florence Nightingale, Hypatia, Susan Sontag, Frida Kahlo, Cleopatra, Anne Frank, Ingrid Bergman, Emily Dickinson, Indira Gandhi,...

Collectibles

The player will be able to unlock collectibles. The collectibles contain the biography and picture of said woman.


Take on a huge new quiz game for PC, different and entertaining. To play alone or with family.

Characteristics


  • 300 questions about the life and work of famous women
  • 50 famous women
  • 6 levels of difficulty
  • 6 themes
  • 50 collectible biographies
  • 1 to 4 players
1506400.supported_languages:
西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
